message:
[Bug] should not delete cookie when cookie->len == 0 on
session_sticky_module
fix bug:In the /etc/resolv.conf file,'#' is not the first character in a line

tcp health check does not need keepalive

making tcp health check be "keepalive" is buggy
if backend server crashes quietly

Resolver: fixed use-after-free memory accesses with CNAME.

When several requests were waiting for a response, then after getting
a CNAME response only the last request's context had the name updated.
Contexts of other requests had the wrong name.  This name was used by
ngx_resolve_name_done() to find the node to remove the request context
from.  When the name was wrong, the request could not be properly
cancelled, its context was freed but stayed linked to the node's waiting
list.  This happened e.g. when the first request was aborted or timed
out before the resolving completed.  When it completed, this triggered
a use-after-free memory access by calling ctx->handler of already freed
request context.  The bug manifests itself by
"could not cancel <name> resolving" alerts in error_log.

When a request was responded with a CNAME, the request context kept
the pointer to the original node's rn->u.cname.  If the original node
expired before the resolving timed out or completed with an error,
this would trigger a use-after-free memory access via ctx->name in
ctx->handler().

The fix is to keep ctx->name unmodified.  The name from context
is no longer used by ngx_resolve_name_done().  Instead, we now keep
the pointer to resolver node to which this request is linked.
Keeping the original name intact also improves logging.

Resolver: fixed CNAME processing for several requests.

When several requests were waiting for a response, then after getting
a CNAME response only the last request was properly processed, while
others were left waiting.
Resolver: fixed possible segmentation fault on DNS format error.

Fixed ngx_parse_time() out of bounds access (ticket #821).

The code failed to ensure that "s" is within the buffer passed for
parsing when checking for "ms", and this resulted in unexpected errors when
parsing non-null-terminated strings with trailing "m".  The bug manifested
itself when the expires directive was used with variables.

Found by Roman Arutyunyan.

Upstream: fixed cache send error handling.

The value of NGX_ERROR, returned from filter handlers, was treated as a generic
upstream error and changed to NGX_HTTP_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR before calling
ngx_http_finalize_request().  This resulted in "header already sent" alert
if header was already sent in filter handlers.

The problem appeared in 54e9b83d00f0 (1.7.5).

Update ngx_http_concat_module.c

bugfix: x-javascript -> javascript
bugfix: upstream check for dynamic
Add variables $trim_bytes and $trim_original_bytes, and fix a bug.
SPDY: fixed compiling error with ssl module

proxy_request_buffering_off: fixed unhandled read/write event

This bug may cause CPU 100% if tengine uses LEVEL event module
(e.g. select, poll, /dev/poll).

While receiving write event from upstream connection, it tries to read
data from client and check whether there is enough data to send to upstream.
If there is not enough data, it just returns and waits next event. However,
there is a bug that it does not "handle" the write event. If it does not delete
the write event from /dev/poll, this write event will be reported to tengine again.
And then tengine has infinite loops.

For read event, the situation is similar to write event.

Thanks to Arne Jansen.

fixed the bug that nginx testconfig (nginx -t) will fail after setting reuseport and started nginx.

issue#565
bugfixed: syslog crashed when used in error_log within 'http' block
Fixed units of delay time in limit_req log
fixed the bug of setting reuse_port have no effect.
upstream rbtree bugfix(issue #530)
bugfix: ngx_http_upstream_init_process will cause coredump while not have http block.

Bugfix: in ngx_http_upstream_dynamic_module

If fail_timeout is enabled and fallback action is specified
to either "stale" or "next", a segmentation fault would happen.

Signed-off-by: Paul Yang(InfoHunter) <paulyang.inf@gmail.com>
Bugfix: /etc/resolv.conf parsing error with ipv6.

SPDY/3: drop the "delayed" flag when finalizing connection

This problem has been fixed for SPDY/2.
More details are available here: http://hg.nginx.org/nginx/rev/a279d2a33dbf
Fixed: fastcgi_check compatible with new health check module
bugfix for upstream
Bugfixed: rewrite directive do not use ngx_http_named_location
bugfix 回滚
修复session sticky加上option=indirect选项导致http 变量乱掉的bug
SPDY: fix bug that server_tag directive can not work

SPDY: fixed the DATA frame length handling in case of some errors.

There are a few cases in ngx_http_spdy_state_read_data() related to error
handling when ngx_http_spdy_state_skip() might be called with an inconsistent
state between *pos and sc->length, that leads to violation of frame layout
parsing and resuted in corruption of spdy connection.

SPDY: fixed parsing of http version.

There is an error while parsing multi-digit minor version numbers (e.g.
"HTTP/1.10").

SPDY: heap buffer overflow (bugfix for CVE-2014-0133)

More details from nginx announcement are available here:
 http://mailman.nginx.org/pipermail/nginx-announce/2014/000135.html

SPDY: memory corruption (bugfix for CVE-2014-0088)

More details from nginx announcement are available here:
 http://mailman.nginx.org/pipermail/nginx-announce/2014/000132.html

SPDY: send output queue after processing of read event.

Some users reported that their spdy client could not receive the reply of PING
frame in time.
Note that this problem has also been fixed in official nginx.
More details are available here: http://hg.nginx.org/nginx/rev/a336cbc3dd44.
fixed a variable set but unused warning

upgrade bugfix:
http://hg.nginx.org/nginx/rev/7586e7b2dbe9
fix bug described in issue 384, which is about persistent connection in upstream_check_module

fix nginx-tfs rcs keepalive bug.

1. fix rc_stat count not initialized bug.

nginx-tfs new feature and bugfixs

1. add reporting access stat to rcs while keepalive and multiple rcs support
2. raw tfs add HEAD protocol for check file exist
3. fix update file fail will rollback lead to unlink file bug
4. fix memory leak bug
5. fix stat larger than 2GB file size is negative bug
6. fix may infinitely looping while saving dedup file bug
7. fix read incomplete large file core bug
8. modify choose unlink cluster related stratery and bugfix
bugfix: don't record request time in subrequest

bugfixed: nodelay of limit_req failed to work
thanks to jiyiping

fixed an problem that it may don't pass the request header

When the client_body_postpone_size is specified to be 0, it doesn't
pass the headers before receving any request body.

nginx-tfs new features and bug-fixs.

1. fix nginx do not close connection bug
2. use readv2 if read from start
3. write failed now retry ns instead of ds
4. fix do not remove dirty block cache when stat large file bug
5. fix pread custom file bug when read offset is larger than 2 times of segment's start offset
6. fix rc timer bug
7. fix write failed bug when data to write is in memory
8. fix select cluster bug
9. add Content-type response header
fixed a bug of trim module.
fixed coding style
Bugfix: the "[alert] zero size buf" error.
fix bug in http_referer_module that using incorrect input string length in the regex matching process when header Referer starts with https://
bugfix when use chrome and safari.
bugfix.
fixed a bug of trim module when javascript is a regular expression.
fixed coding style
fixed coding style
bugfixed: "buffer" is disabled in access_log
session_sticky_bugfix

fixed proxy chunked response security problem

http://mailman.nginx.org/pipermail/nginx-announce/2013/000114.html

A security problem related to CVE-2013-2028 was identified,
affecting some previous nginx versions if proxy_pass to
untrusted upstream HTTP servers is used.

The problem may lead to a denial of service or a disclosure of a
worker process memory on a specially crafted response from an
upstream proxied server.
consistent_hash bugfix
fixed the missing with invalid character for ngx_unescape_uri
fixed for nginx standard

1. fix read corrupted large file bug.
2. remove some redundant code.

bugfix

1. 当读文件请求返回status_msg时（如ds正在升级不能提供服务时）仍使用read_resp_msg去解析会导致解析错误，打印错误的内存数据到log中，并可能导致超时
2. 修改默认的从后端接收buf大小为2M，确保在下载文件返回应答的头时能够获得file_info
3. 在下载原生文件时如果得到了文件的file_info，就在应答头里面加上文件的last-modified时间
4. 修复一些错误的返回值

fix client timed out bug.
should not return 500 when client timed out.

bugfix

if hit invalid local block, should not select data server

1. bugfix: read large file/custom file timeout or core
2. buffix: close file may failed (crc error) when write retry occurs
fixed coding style

Fixed segmentation fault in ngx_show_dso_directives() and ngx_is_dynamic_module().if we don't set dso block in nginx config, ctx->module is NULL, and then exec nginx -v, -m or -l will casuse nginx coredump.
fix bug for dso module (start nginx and no dso block, and then add dso block and dso module, at last reload nginx, nginx will reload failed).
fixed coding style
ngx_http_user_agent_module bugfix
fixed a segment fault bug with upstream check module when check timeout is longer than the check interval
fixed the id prameter

fix bug(the number of limit_req's parameters)

    Thanks to LazyZhu
fixed wrong log format with upstream check module

fixed an bug with wrong array index
This could cause the connection left in old work process when reloading
bugfix: range mode of the geo module caused the coredump, when not set the default value
fixed the wrong log format type
fixed wrong format type with error log in upstream check module

set delay_start default value.
bugfix:msleep after process init.
bugfix:priority of procs module is useless

1 fix bugs of the limit_req module(please read this issue https://github.com/taobao/tengine/pull/1).

2 add test case for limit_req module.

3 refactor some code and fixed code style.
